caption.p: Results of CCS implementation in billion tons of CO 2 in ALT multi-stage decision case

table-wrap-foot.p: The columns filled by the same color indicate the same state in stage 2 with identical true climate sensitivity, whereas the states in stage 1 are different
The second, the third and the fourth rows indicate the states in 2040, 2050 and the true climate sensitivity revealed beyond 2100 corresponding to TableÂ 1, respectively
